chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor
chapter.para: This resource adaptor provides a Diameter API for JAIN SLEE applications, according to Sh inteface based on Diameter protocol.

Events represent Diameter Sh messages received by the Diameter stack. Different events types are specified for each Diameter request or answer. Since this RA only operates on the server-side, events are fired on server activities.
The Activities are defined by RA Type to ease use of RA. Activities represent Diameter session between two peers. SLEE applications use activities to create, send and receive messages.
